'''Alpha v1.0.6''',<ref>{{ytl|wnMN_-X_bzE|Minecraft Gameplay|NeXuSJumpeR|July 16, 2010}}</ref> also known as '''Seecret Friday 5''', is the fifth [[seecret update]] and the third of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on July 16, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:819109118|Seecret Friday 5! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, July 16, 2010</ref> which added [[boat]]s, [[cacti]] and large [[tree]]s.

== Additions ==
{{Additions table|Cactus
|Oak Boat}}

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Cactus JE1.png|32px]] [[Cactus]]'''
* Player receives {{hp|1}} damage when ''punching them'', ''right clicking on them'', or ''making steps on them''.
*  [[File:Cactus (item) JE1.png|32px]] They look like this in the inventory.
*  Generates anywhere with sand.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:Oak Boat JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Oak Boat (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[Boat]]s'''
* Can be ridden by right-clicking on them.
* They break if they are placed on the land, or if impact with the land is made.
* Can fit into a single block of water.
* Crafted with [[planks]].
{{Crafting table
|A2=Oak Planks
|A3=Oak Planks
|B3=Oak Planks
|C2=Oak Planks
|C3=Oak Planks
|Output=Oak Boat}}

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Oak JE5.png|32px]] [[Tree]]s'''
* Re-added fancy trees with less chance to spawn, as they now coexist with normal trees.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Leaves JE2.png|32px]] [[Leaves]]'''
* No longer decay.
* Now have a {{frac|1|20}} (5%) chance of dropping a [[sapling]] instead of {{frac|1|10}} (10%).

'''[[File:Snow Block JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snow Block]]'''
* No longer washed away by water.
* Now require only 4 snowballs to be crafted instead of 9.
** They still always drop 6 snowballs, allowing for an infinite source of snowballs.
{{Crafting table
|A2=Snowball
|A3=Snowball
|B2=Snowball
|B3=Snowball
|Output=Snow Block}}

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* [[Item]]s can now be seen being held in [[third person]], but they are huge in terms of scale.

'''[[File:Snowball JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snowball]]s'''
* Now stack up to 16 instead of 8.
* Thrown snowballs won't disappear anymore.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Pig JE1.png|32px]] [[Pig]]'''
* Now only spawn above [[grass block]]s.

'''[[File:White Sheep JE1.png|32px]] [[Sheep]]'''
* Now only spawn above [[grass block]]s.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed snowing through snow blocks.</onlyinclude>
